multivalorisation: Articles dans des revues du WOS
tag_dispo: Tests de provenances et descendances de chênes et hêtre
description: The dataset is composed of 5 columns and 1140 lines:    “Garden” is the code for the common garden: 1 is for “Petite Charnie” (western France), 2 for “Vincence” (center of France) and 3 for “Sillegny” (north-eastern France)    “Code” is the code number of the oak provenance    “Provenance” is the name of the source site of the acorns (see table 1 of the paper for details)    “Year” is the year of growth    “GI” is the Growth Index: 33 954 tree rings on the 2420 dominant or co-dominant trees were analyzed. Each individual series of Basal Area Increment was double-detrended with the ratio between the raw value and the fitted cubic splines in the DENDRO function in R (Cook and Peter, 1981; Mérian, 2012) and 78 detrended master chronologies were calculated. These 78 master chronologies were used to compute the climate-tree growth relationships from the common period 1996-2010 and are included in the present dataset.

multivalorisation: Articles dans des revues du WOS
description: Site web "Oak Genome Sequencing", développé dans le cadre du projet ANR GENOAK.Données et informations accessibles sur le site web du projet : http://www.oakgenome.fr/

multivalorisation: Articles dans des revues du WOS
description: This dataset contains the data that correspond to the article "Needle anatomic plasticity is related to better water-use efficiency and resistance to embolism in fast-growing Pinus pinaster families in conditions of water scarcity". The dataset is composed of three files:* Variables_Needle_Anatomy_Data-Sheet-1.csv : measurements and numeric data coming from 177 seedlings of Pinus pinaster (Sheet 1, 42 variables measured)* Variables_Needle_Anatomy_Data-Sheet-2.csv : measurements and numeric data coming from 177 seedlings of Pinus pinaster (Sheet 2, 18 variables measured)* Variables_Needle_Anatomy_Description.docx : definition of variables and units

multivalorisation: Articles dans des revues du WOS
description: Supporting information to the article from Saleh et al. 2021 published in Evolution Letters: "Genome-wide evolutionary response of European oaks since the Little Ice Age". These data were required to detect polymorphisms in the Oak genome. A total of 348,863,070 reads per pool were mapped onto the v2.3 Q. robur genome assembly using bwa-mem. Incorrectly paired reads and reads giving multiple alignments were removed with samtools. Duplications were removed with Picard tools. Pileup files were generated for each scaffold over all forests, with samtools. These 1,337 pileup files correspond to the pileups for 1,337 oak scaffolds.  These data are availalble in the BIOGECO Dataverse in the data.inra portal here: https://data.inrae.fr/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.15454/JLA1A0

Pineline est une application web adossée à une base de données contenant des données en temps continu : Micro-variations radiales du tronc couplées aux variations environnementales. L'accès à l'application est disponible à cette URL : http://pineline.pierroton.inra.fr/pineline/

title: Genome-wide evolutionary : detection of polymorphisms in the Oak genome
description: Supporting information to the article from Saleh et al. 2021 published in Evolution Letters: "Genome-wide evolutionary response of European oaks since the Little Ice Age". These data were required to detect polymorphisms in the Oak genome. A total of 348,863,070 reads per pool were mapped onto the v2.3 Q. robur genome assembly using bwa-mem. Incorrectly paired reads and reads giving multiple alignments were removed with samtools. Duplications were removed with Picard tools. Pileup files were generated for each scaffold over all forests, with samtools. These 1,337 pileup files correspond to the pileups for 1,337 oak scaffolds.  These data are availalble in the BIOGECO Dataverse in the data.inra portal here: https://data.inrae.fr/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.15454/JLA1A0

multivalorisation: Articles dans des revues du WOS
description: An easy and robust method for isolation and validation of single nucleotide polymorphic markers from the Erysiphe alphitoides, the oak powdery mildew, draft genome" (en révision pour Mycological progress - Mars 2020)Première ébauche de de génome pour Erysiphe alphitoides (une des espèces agent de l'oïdium des chênes), isolement de variations nucléotidiques dans des gènes en général conservés et en simple copie dans les génomes de champignons (gènes issus de la base de données funybase) et développement de deux puces pour génotyper ces variations en utilisant la technologie Sequenom.Les données (séquences des gènes, SNP, et scripts pour la détection) sont disponibles sur https://doi.org/10.15454/UGMTBK, Portail Data INRAE, V1 L'ébauche de génome utilise des séquences courtes rassemblées dans l'archive  SRR10956459 (Bioproject: PRJNA593204). l'assemblage du génome et son annotation sont disponibles sur http://arachne.pierroton.inra.fr/AlphiGeno/data.html.

multivalorisation: Articles dans des revues du WOS
tag_financeur: Agence de l'Eau Bassin Adour Garonne
description: les données sont réparties en deux tables : table uno = données dendrométriques et localisation de 317 hêtres et 79 chênes pédonculés dans la vallée du Cirontable zwei = données de cernes = largeur de cerne par année des arbres précédents, surface de cerne et indice de croissance annuel standardisé pour prendre en compte l'effet de l'âge cambial (méthode Régional Curve Standardisation, comme qui dirait)ces données sont belles; elles ont été acquises durant la thèse d'Adib Ouayjan qui n'a pas pu trouver un job dans notre domaine en raison de l'aveuglement de nos prétendus "dirigeants" à tous les niveaux hiérarchiques (que leur ADN mute et se transforme en spaguetti).

multivalorisation: Articles dans des revues du WOS
description:
The dataset contains data characterizing the reproduction of 342 trees monitored during four years, from 2014 to 2017, within a full-sib family of pedunculated oak (Quercus robur) situated at the experimental unit of Bourran, France. Seed production (Ntot), the total mass of seed produced (Mtot), the mean mass of one seed (Ma) and the seed production normalized per tree diameter (Ntot/D) were assessed for every tree of the design.
The data has been submitted to the public QuercusMap database, available at http://mapedigree.pierroton.inra.fr/qmap
